      Respond to the given command from another client.

      Called when an attempt by the client with this event handler to join a room fails.

      Called when another client disconnects from the server.

      Called when another client joins the server.
      default void ClientEventHandler.handleRoomAdded(RoomInfo room, GameClient client)
      Called when a room is added to the server
      default void ClientEventHandler.handleRoomClosed(java.lang.String roomId, GameClient client)
      Called when a room is closed (blocking clients from joining).
      default void ClientEventHandler.handleRoomOpened(java.lang.String roomId, GameClient client)
      Called when a room is opened (allowing clients to join) You should close a room before starting a game so players cannot join after the game started.
      default void ClientEventHandler.handleRoomOwnership(java.lang.String roomId, java.lang.String ownerId, GameClient client)
      Called when the ownership of a room changes.
      default void ClientEventHandler.handleRoomRemoved(java.lang.String roomId, GameClient client)
      Called when a room is removed from the server
      default void ClientEventHandler.onDisconnected(GameClient client)
      This method is called when this client is disconnected from the server.
      default void ClientEventHandler.onIdAssigned(java.lang.String clientId, GameClient client)
      Do what needs to be done when this client is assigned an ID by the server.
